targets.query: location: syscheck AND syscheck.event: added AND syscheck.audit.user.name: *.* AND NOT syscheck.path: HKEY* AND NOT syscheck.path: *queue*
location: syscheck AND syscheck.event: modified AND syscheck.audit.user.name: *.* AND NOT syscheck.path: HKEY* AND NOT syscheck.path: *queue*
location: syscheck AND syscheck.event: deleted AND syscheck.audit.user.name: *.* AND NOT syscheck.path: HKEY* AND NOT syscheck.path: *queue*

panels.description: High amount of POST requests in a small period of time (likely bot).
panels.title: Rules: (31533) - DDoS Detected

options.content:
BRUTE FORCE

Rules:5763 e 5712 - brute force trying to get access to the system. Authentication failed or Non Existent User.

targets.query: rule.id: 92657 AND NOT data.win.eventdata.ipAddress: null AND NOT data.win.eventdata.ipAddress: 127.0.0.1 AND data.win.eventdata.targetUserName: *.*
rule.id:92657 AND NOT data.win.eventdata.ipAddress: null AND NOT data.win.eventdata.ipAddress: 127.0.0.1 AND data.win.eventdata.targetUserName: *.*
